identity.name: HopeConnect
identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode Dominant (Trust/Transparency) with Dark Mode support

usage.h1: text-5xl md:text-6xl font-bold tracking-tight text-primary font-heading
usage.h2: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-semibold tracking-tight text-foreground font-heading
usage.caption: text-sm font-medium tracking-wide uppercase text-muted-foreground/80 font-accent

primary.name: Deep Forest
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key headings

secondary.name: Terracotta Clay
secondary.usage: Call to actions, highlights, donation buttons

glassmorphism.usage: Sticky headers, toast notifications, overlay cards
glassmorphism.classes: bg-white/70 dark:bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-sm

gradients.usage: Subtle background meshes, never for text
gradients.style: Radial gradient from top-left (Pale Sage) to bottom-right (Warm Sand)

borders.radius: rounded-xl or rounded-2xl for cards, rounded-full for buttons

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-transform
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-4 bg-accent text-accent-foreground hover:bg-accent/80

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-lg border-input bg-background/50 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 transition-all

hero_bg.alt: Woman teaching children in a rural classroom
hero_bg.usage: Hero section background or main visual

volunteers.alt: Group of volunteers in yellow shirts

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text. Use 'text-foreground' on 'bg-background'.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements (ring-2 ring-primary/50).

motion.hover: Subtle lift (-translate-y-1) for cards, color shift for buttons.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE /app/frontend/src/index.css with the CSS variables provided in 'colors.css_variables'.
3. CONFIGURE Tailwind to use the new font families (Merriweather, Inter).
4. IMPLEMENT the Landing Page using the 'Bento Grid' layout strategy.
5. BUILD the Dashboard using the 'High Density' grid strategy with Sidebar.
6. CUSTOMIZE Shadcn components (Button, Card, Input) to match the 'rounded-full' and 'rounded-2xl' styles.
7. USE the provided image URLs for their respective sections.
8. ENSURE all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (p-8, p-12).
Add micro-interactions to every button and card.
Never use pure black (#000000) or pure white (#ffffff) - use the tinted variables.
